name: Quick and Easy Tater Tot Casserole
author: Tammi
summary: This is a quick and easy casserole the whole family will love, especially those picky eaters!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Crumble hamburger into a 9x13 inch baking pan
Sprinkle meat with garlic powder, salt and pepper
Cover the hamburger with tater tots
In a bowl, stir together mushroom soup, celery soup and milk
Pour the soup mixture over the potatoes and hamburger and sprinkle with additional garlic powder
Bake in preheated oven for 60 minutes
